_comment: This is an example file to show how to generate multi-exponential time traces. The relevant parameters are: offset, timescales, amplitude, n_steps, sigma! The multi-exponential function is: S(n) = s_0-sum_{k=1,K} s_k e^{-t/tau_k} (amplitdues s_0/s_k, timescales tau_k). Multiple observables can be generated at the same time. Therefore it is required/recommended to define for each observable all parameters (EXCEPT n_steps), even if they are the same.
